function.description: Sensor function. Returns the list of the animal coordinates.

parameter.name: specificKey
parameter.paramDescription: The specific animal values that will be returned. The possible values are ["id", "species", "is_robot", "coordinates", "x_coordinate", "y_coordinate", "status"].

function.description: Return a list of dictionary objects with all of the animal data.
